languages.text: "Конечно, в этой партии была центральная фигура. Воплощение свободы выбора, мой великолепный Алтарь. Столько накопленного потенциала за годы экспериментов. Он поврежден, но все еще манит, ждет пока им воспользуются..." {n}Руолдо с едкой улыбкой смотрит вам в глаза.{/n} "Рекомендую беречь его — кто знает сколько тысяч жизней заберет его выплеснувшаяся сила, если с ним что-то случится?"

"Of course, this game involved one key piece. The embodiment of freedom of choice — my magnificent Altar. So much accumulated potential from years of experimentation. It is damaged, but it still beckons, waiting to be used..." {n}Ruoldo looks you in the eye with a caustic smile.{/n} "I advise you to keep it safe — who knows how many thousands of lives it will claim if something happens to it, unleashing all that power?"
languages.original_text: "Конечно, в этой партии была центральная фигура. Воплощение свободы выбора, мой великолепный Алтарь. Столько накопленного потенциала за годы экспериментов. Он поврежден, но все еще манит, ждет пока им воспользуются..." {n}Руолдо с едкой улыбкой смотрит вам в глаза.{/n} "Рекомендую беречь его — кто знает сколько тысяч жизней заберет его выплеснувшаяся сила, если с ним что-то случится?"

It is damaged, but it still beckons, waiting to be used..." {n}Ruoldo looks you in the eye with a caustic smile.{/n} "I advise you to keep it safe — who knows how many thousands of lives it will claim if something happens to it, unleashing all that power?"

languages.text: “当然，这场游戏有个至关重要的因素——那便是自由选择的化身，也就是我这座宏伟的祭坛。经过这么多年的实验，它积攒了极其强大的力量。尽管它现在被破坏了，但它依然在召唤着，等待有人唤醒它的力量……”{n}罗尔多看着你，脸上挂着恶毒的笑容。{/n}“我建议你把它保护好。万一它遭遇了什么不测，释放出了所有潜在的力量，这会夺走多少人的性命呢？”
languages.original_text: "Of course, this game involved one key piece. The embodiment of freedom of choice — my magnificent Altar. So much accumulated potential from years of experimentation. It is damaged, but it still beckons, waiting to be used..." {n}Ruoldo looks you in the eye with a caustic smile.{/n} "I advise you to keep it safe — who knows how many thousands of lives it will claim if something happens to it, unleashing all that power?"

traits.locale_text: “当然，这场游戏有个至关重要的因素——那便是自由选择的化身，也就是我这座宏伟的祭坛。经过这么多年的实验，它积攒了极其强大的力量。尽管它现在被破坏了，但它依然在召唤着，等待有人唤醒它的力量……”{n}罗尔多看着你，脸上挂着恶毒的笑容。{/n}“我建议你把它保护好。万一它遭遇了什么不测，释放出了所有潜在的力量，这会夺走多少人的性命呢？”

languages.text: 「もちろん、このゲームには重要なピースがあった。自由意志の具現である、私の壮麗なる祭壇さ。何年もの実験で蓄積された膨大な可能性を秘めてる。傷ついちゃいるけど、まだ人を誘って、使われるのを待ってるんだよ…」{n}ルオルドは皮肉な笑みを浮かべてあなたを見つめた。{/n}「大切に保管することを勧めるよ。もし何かあってこの力が解き放たれたら、いったい何千もの命が失われるか分からないからな？」
languages.original_text: "Of course, this game involved one key piece. The embodiment of freedom of choice — my magnificent Altar. So much accumulated potential from years of experimentation. It is damaged, but it still beckons, waiting to be used..." {n}Ruoldo looks you in the eye with a caustic smile.{/n} "I advise you to keep it safe — who knows how many thousands of lives it will claim if something happens to it, unleashing all that power?"

traits.locale_text: 「もちろん、このゲームには重要なピースがあった。自由意志の具現である、私の壮麗なる祭壇さ。何年もの実験で蓄積された膨大な可能性を秘めてる。傷ついちゃいるけど、まだ人を誘って、使われるのを待ってるんだよ…」{n}ルオルドは皮肉な笑みを浮かべてあなたを見つめた。{/n}「大切に保管することを勧めるよ。もし何かあってこの力が解き放たれたら、いったい何千もの命が失われるか分からないからな？」

languages.text: «Por supuesto, este juego tenía una pieza clave: la encarnación del libre albedrío, mi magnífico Altar. Tanto potencial acumulado tras años de experimentación... Está dañado, pero aún nos llama, esperando a que alguien lo use...». {n}Ruoldo te mira a los ojos con una sonrisa mordaz.{/n} «Le recomiendo que lo trate con cuidado. ¿Quién sabe cuántos miles de vidas puede arrebatar si le ocurre algo y se libera todo ese poder?».
languages.original_text: "Of course, this game involved one key piece. The embodiment of freedom of choice — my magnificent Altar. So much accumulated potential from years of experimentation. It is damaged, but it still beckons, waiting to be used..." {n}Ruoldo looks you in the eye with a caustic smile.{/n} "I advise you to keep it safe — who knows how many thousands of lives it will claim if something happens to it, unleashing all that power?"

traits.locale_text: «Por supuesto, este juego tenía una pieza clave: la encarnación del libre albedrío, mi magnífico Altar. Tanto potencial acumulado tras años de experimentación... Estña dañado, pero aún nos llama, esperando a que alguien lo use...». {n}Ruoldo te mira a los ojos con una sonrisa mordaz.{/n} «Le recomiendo que lo trate con cuidado. ¿Quién sabe cuántos miles de vidas puede arrebatar si le ocurre algo y se libera todo ese poder?».

languages.text: "Natürlich gehörte zu diesem Spiel ein unverzichtbares Objekt. Die Verkörperung des freien Willens – mein großartiger Altar. Unmengen angesammeltes Potenzial aus jahrelangen Experimenten. Er ist beschädigt, aber er lockt noch immer und wartet darauf, benutzt zu werden ..." {n}Ruoldo sieht dir in die Augen und lächelt ätzend.{/n} "Ich rate Euch, ihn sicher zu verwahren – wer weiß, wie viele Tausend Leben er fordern wird, wenn ihm etwas zustößt und all die Macht plötzlich entfesselt wird."
languages.original_text: "Of course, this game involved one key piece. The embodiment of freedom of choice — my magnificent Altar. So much accumulated potential from years of experimentation. It is damaged, but it still beckons, waiting to be used..." {n}Ruoldo looks you in the eye with a caustic smile.{/n} "I advise you to keep it safe — who knows how many thousands of lives it will claim if something happens to it, unleashing all that power?"

Unmengen angesammeltes Potenzial aus jahrelangen Experimenten. Er ist beschädigt, aber er lockt noch immer und wartet darauf, benutzt zu werden ..." {n}Ruoldo sieht dir in die Augen und lächelt ätzend.{/n} "Ich rate Euch, ihn sicher zu verwahren – wer weiß, wie viele Tausend Leben er fordern wird, wenn ihm etwas zustößt und all die Macht plötzlich entfesselt wird."

languages.text: "Tabii bu oyunda önemli bir parça bulunuyordu. Bu parça da seçim özgürlüğünün somutlaşmış hâli olan görkemli Sunak idi. Yıllar boyu süren deneyler sayesinde biriken muazzam bir potansiyel barındırıyordu. Sunak hasar görmüş olsa bile bu potansiyel hâlâ daha kullanılmayı bekliyor." {n}Ruoldo, iğneleyici bir gülümsemeyle gözlerinin içine bakıyor.{/n} "Güvende tutulduğundan emin ol. Başına bir şey gelecek olursa tüm o açığa çıkacak güçle kim bilir kaç kişinin hayatına mal olur..."
languages.original_text: "Of course, this game involved one key piece. The embodiment of freedom of choice — my magnificent Altar. So much accumulated potential from years of experimentation. It is damaged, but it still beckons, waiting to be used..." {n}Ruoldo looks you in the eye with a caustic smile.{/n} "I advise you to keep it safe — who knows how many thousands of lives it will claim if something happens to it, unleashing all that power?"

traits.locale_text: "Tabii bu oyunda önemli bir parça bulunuyordu. Bu parça da seçim özgürlüğünün somutlaşmış hâli olan görkemli Sunak'ımdı. Yıllar boyu süren deneyler sayesinde biriken muazzam bir potansiyel barındırıyordu. Sunak hasar görmüş olsa bile bu potansiyel hâlâ daha kullanılmayı bekliyor." {n}Ruoldo, iğneleyici bir gülümsemeyle gözlerinin içine bakar.{/n} "Güvende tutulduğundan emin ol derim. Başına bir şey gelecek olursa tüm o açığa çıkacak güçle kim bilir kaç kişinin hayatına mal olur..."

languages.text: « Bien sûr, ce petit jeu nécessitait un élément clé. L'incarnation de la liberté de choix, mon magnifique autel. Tant de potentiel accumulé au fil de ces longues années d'expérimentation. Il a beau être endommagé, son pouvoir demeure intact, et il ne demande qu'à être utilisé... » {n}Ruoldo vous défie du regard avec un sourire caustique.{/n} « À votre place, je le surveillerais comme le lait sur le feu... Qui sait combien de milliers de vies il emporterait avec lui s'il lui arrivait quelque chose et que toute cette puissance contenue était libérée ? »
languages.original_text: "Of course, this game involved one key piece. The embodiment of freedom of choice — my magnificent Altar. So much accumulated potential from years of experimentation. It is damaged, but it still beckons, waiting to be used..." {n}Ruoldo looks you in the eye with a caustic smile.{/n} "I advise you to keep it safe — who knows how many thousands of lives it will claim if something happens to it, unleashing all that power?"
